TITLE: Installing Required Packages for Virtual Environment Setup in Debian/Ubuntu
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Python packages required for creating a virtual environment. This installs python3-venv for virtual environment management and python3-pip for package installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rackerlabs/genestack/blob/main/ansible/roles/octavia_preconf/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
root@saturn-c1:~# apt-get install python3-venv python3-pip
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Security Group Rules in OpenStack
DESCRIPTION: These commands create security group rules to allow SSH (port 22) and ICMP traffic. This is necessary to enable access to the instances.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rackerlabs/genestack/blob/main/docs/openstack-floating-ips.md#2025-04-20_snippet_20

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
openstack --os-cloud={cloud name} security group rule create --proto tcp \
                                         --dst-port 22 \
                                         --remote-ip 0.0.0.0/0 default
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
openstack --os-cloud={cloud name} security group rule create --proto icmp \
                                         --dst-port -1 default
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding a Subnet to an OpenStack Network
DESCRIPTION: Command to create and attach a subnet to an existing OpenStack network. This example creates an IPv4 subnet with a specified CIDR range and connects it to a previously created network.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rackerlabs/genestack/blob/main/docs/openstack-networks.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
openstack  --os-cloud {cloud_name} subnet create --ip-version 4 --subnet-range 172.18.107.0/24 --network {network-name} {subnet-name}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Openstack Load Balancer
DESCRIPTION: Command to modify existing load balancer settings including name, description, QoS policy, and enable/disable status.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rackerlabs/genestack/blob/main/docs/openstack-load-balancer.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
openstack --os-cloud {user cloud name} loadbalancer set
    [--name <name>]
    [--description <description>]
    [--vip-qos-policy-id <vip_qos_policy_id>]
    [--enable | --disable]
    [--wait]
    [--tag <tag>]
    [--no-tag]
    <load_balancer>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating External Network for Kubernetes Cluster in OpenStack
DESCRIPTION: Creates a public external network with VLAN provider type for use with Magnum Kubernetes clusters. This network is created in the service project to be accessible by multiple tenants.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rackerlabs/genestack/blob/main/docs/magnum-kubernetes-cluster-setup-guide.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
openstack network create public --provider-network-type vlan --external --project service
```

TITLE: Uncordoning a Kubernetes Node in Shell
DESCRIPTION: This command uncordons a Kubernetes node that may be in a 'Ready' but 'SchedulingDisabled' state after a failed upgrade attempt. It allows the node to resume normal operations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rackerlabs/genestack/blob/main/docs/k8s-kubespray-upgrade.md#2025-04-20_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```

```

TITLE: Heading Hierarchy Structure in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the proper nesting hierarchy for headings in Markdown documentation. Shows a title heading followed by main headings and sub-headings in the correct order.

TITLE: Installing RabbitMQ Exporter using Shell Script
DESCRIPTION: This command runs a shell script to install the RabbitMQ Exporter chart. The script is located in the 'bin' directory and is named 'install-chart.sh'. It takes 'prometheus-rabbitmq-exporter' as an argument.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rackerlabs/genestack/blob/main/docs/prometheus-rabbitmq-exporter.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

CODE:
```
bin/install-chart.sh prometheus-rabbitmq-exporter
```

TITLE: Modifying Gateway API Route Domain - Shell
DESCRIPTION: Shell commands to create directory and modify the domain name in the route configuration using sed
SOURCE: https://github.com/rackerlabs/genestack/blob/main/docs/infrastructure-nginx-gateway-api-custom.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
mkdir -p /etc/genestack/gateway-api/routes
sed 's/your.domain.tld/<YOUR_DOMAIN>/g' \
    /opt/genestack/etc/gateway-api/routes/custom-<SERVICE_NAME>-gateway-route.yaml \
    > /etc/genestack/gateway-api/routes/custom-<SERVICE_NAME>-gateway-route.yaml
```

TITLE: Downloading Files from an OpenStack Container
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to construct a URL for accessing public files and how to download a single file from a container using the OpenStack CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rackerlabs/genestack/blob/main/docs/storage-object-store-openstack-cli.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
<REGIONAL_ENDPOINT>/storage/container/detail/flex-container01/example.rtf
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
openstack --os-cloud $CLOUD object save flex-container01 example.rtf
```

TITLE: Adding Member Roles to Platform-Services User
DESCRIPTION: Assigns the 'member' role to the platform-services user in both the platform-services project and default domain with inheritance.

TITLE: Authenticating and Enabling Audit Logging in Vault

SOURCE: https://github.com/rackerlabs/genestack/blob/main/docs/vault.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```

kubectl exec -it vault-0 -n vault -- vault audit enable file file_path=/vault/audit/audit.log
```
